content: will hopefully describe this further if that isn t clear the chart is split up over 8 pages page 1 of the pattern starts on page 3 of this pattern and is put back together as follows this should also give you an idea of the overall design for this chart start at the top and work down working left to right and then right to left 454y 0pl uk crochet terms used  treble_crochet tc  chain
